article.headline: Berkshire Hathaway Inc. Cl A stock falls Tuesday, still outperforms market
article.body: Shares of Berkshire Hathaway Inc. Cl A BRK.A, +0.06% slid 1.14% to $315,350.00 Tuesday, on what proved to be an all-around rough trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index SPX, +0.87% falling 1.40% to 3,360.97 and Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, +0.56% falling 1.34% to 27,772.76. Berkshire Hathaway Inc. Cl A closed $32,050.00 below its 52-week high ($347,400.00), which the company reached on January 17th. The stock demonstrated a mixed performance when compared to some of its competitors Tuesday, as Honeywell International Inc. HON, +0.34% fell 1.08% to $166.89, 3M Co. MMM, +0.94% fell 0.32% to $162.23, and General Electric Co. GE, +2.85% fell 3.74% to $6.17. Trading volume (274) remained 120 below its 50-day average volume of 394.
